patched_yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: scanner
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  schedule: 15,45 * * * *
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
            app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
            app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        spec:
          serviceAccountName: default
          restartPolicy: Never
          initContainers:
          - name: check-db-ready
            image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:stable
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            env:
            - name: PGHOST
              value: release-name-postgresql.default
            - name: PGPORT
              value: '5432'
            - name: PGUSER
              value: postgres
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
          containers:
          - name: scanner
            image: artifacthub/scanner:v1.21.0
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            volumeMounts:
            - name: scanner-config
              mountPath: /home/scanner/.cfg
              readOnly: true
          volumes:
          - name: scanner-config
            secret:
              secretName: scanner-config

apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: scanner
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  schedule: 15,45 * * * *
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
            app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
            app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        spec:
          serviceAccountName: default
          restartPolicy: Never
          initContainers:
          - name: check-db-ready
            image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:latest
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            env:
            - name: PGHOST
              value: release-name-postgresql.default
            - name: PGPORT
              value: '5432'
            - name: PGUSER
              value: postgres
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
            securityContext:
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              privileged: false
          containers:
          - name: scanner
            image: artifacthub/scanner:v1.21.0
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            volumeMounts:
            - name: scanner-config
              mountPath: /home/scanner/.cfg
              readOnly: true
            securityContext:
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              privileged: false
          volumes:
          - name: scanner-config
            secret:
              secretName: scanner-config

kind: CronJob
metadata:

  labels:

    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub

spec:

  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:

            command:

            - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;

apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: scanner
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  schedule: 15,45 * * * *
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
            app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
            app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        spec:
          serviceAccountName: default
          restartPolicy: Never
          initContainers:
          - name: check-db-ready
            image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:latest
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            env:
            - name: PGHOST
              value: release-name-postgresql.default
            - name: PGPORT
              value: '5432'
            - name: PGUSER
              value: postgres
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 100m
                memory: 128Mi
              limits:
                cpu: 500m
                memory: 256Mi
            securityContext:
              privileged: false
          containers:
          - name: scanner
            image: artifacthub/scanner:v1.21.0
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            volumeMounts:
            - name: scanner-config
              mountPath: /home/scanner/.cfg
              readOnly: true
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 100m
                memory: 128Mi
              limits:
                cpu: 500m
                memory: 256Mi
            securityContext:
              privileged: false
          volumes:
          - name: scanner-config
            secret:
              secretName: scanner-config

apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: tracker
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  schedule: 1,30 * * * *
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
            app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
            app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
            app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        spec:
          serviceAccountName: default
          restartPolicy: Never
          initContainers:
          - name: check-db-ready
            image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:stable
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            env:
            - name: PGHOST
              value: release-name-postgresql.default
            - name: PGPORT
              value: '5432'
            - name: PGUSER
              value: postgres
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
          containers:
          - name: tracker
            image: artifacthub/tracker:v1.21.0
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            volumeMounts:
            - name: tracker-config
              mountPath: /home/tracker/.cfg
              readOnly: true
          volumes:
          - name: tracker-config
            secret:
              secretName: tracker-config
